INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_CONV_EVNT (CEVENT_ID, NEW_INSTR_ID, SHAR_RATIO_INIT, SHAR_RATIO_TO,EFF_DATE, CONV_DATE, IS_CCASS_STK, AC_HOLD_STK_TXN_ID) VALUES (#{item.ceventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.newInstrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.sharRatioInit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.sharRatioTo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.convDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.isCcassStk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.acHoldStkTxnId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
